id: scenario-value-scanner-adult-scenarios-workplace-organizational-workplace culture shift from extraction to care economy principles
title: Workplace culture shift from extraction to care economy principles
description: Workplace culture shift from extraction to care economy principles
content:
Scenario: Workplace culture shift from extraction to care economy principles
    Given Sarah's workplace could adopt care economy principles
    And organizational culture shapes employee well-being
    When Sarah advocates for cultural change
    Then the workplace_elohim should support care economy adoption
    And workplace culture should value employee well-being
    And success should be measured by care, not just extraction
    And organizational culture should recognize care creates value
    And Sarah's workplace should demonstrate care economy in employment
